description:
Usagi and the girls are searching for Luna, who has gone missing for nearly a week. To their surprise, they find Luna being introduced on TV as Yaten’s pet cat.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Luna wa Mita!? Idol Yaten no Sugao
Luna`s Discovery: The Real Face of Yaten
¡Luna lo ha visto! La verdadera personalidad de Yaten.
ルナは見た!? アイドル夜天の素顔
